players.name: Kobe Briant
players.description: ((height: 6ft, hair-color: ginger, skin-color: dark)A methodical and unhurried maestro who controls the game's tempo with a herky-jerky, unpredictable style. He excels at using deliberate changes of pace and elite footwork to get to his spots in the mid-range, finishing with crafty layups or pulling up for lethal, efficient jumpers. His calm demeanor belies a relentless scoring prowess that anchors his team's offense.) A master route technician whose elite release, body control, and contested-catch ability make him arguably the most complete receiver in the game. His play is defined by sudden, precise breaks and an almost psychic connection with the quarterback, consistently creating separation and turning routine plays into highlight-reel moments.
